11.content: How well Ruby end up messing her underwear?
11.title: Ruby

113.content:
After a day of boring classes and a particularly tiring training session Ruby went to bed early wanting the day to be over with.

As soon as she fell asleep someone went up to Ruby's bunk. They carefully started playing a tapes with a bit of Dust she had recorded. The figure's voice softly drifted out of the speakers into Ruby’s ears, quiet enough that only she could hear the hypnotic content.

“You have no control over your bowels. You have no control over your bladder. You get aroused by messing yourself. You will always immediately mess yourself when you hear the words 'dirty, messy, or cookies' and wet yourself when you hear the word 'wet, rain, or milk' and finally you will do both if you hear the words ‘bathroom, soil, or dolt’.”

The figure woke up early and turned off the tape. She couldn’t wait to see if the new trigger she added would work.

Who was the one to plant the trigger words into Ruby?
113.title: Gets hypnotized to mess and wet on command
